remarks: An entry of a submatrix of a square matrix.  (Contributed by AV, 28-Dec-2018.)
statement:
submafval.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
submafval.q $e |- Q = ( N subMat R ) $.
submafval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
submaeval $p |- ( ( M e. B /\ ( K e. N /\ L e. N ) /\ ( I e. ( N \ { K } ) /\ J e. ( N \ { L } ) ) ) -> ( I ( K ( Q ` M ) L ) J ) = ( I M J ) ) $.
